meanings.definition: A white blood cell that helps the body fight off infections.
meanings.sent1: The leukocyte attacked the harmful germs in the body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study leukocytes to understand how they protect us from sickness.
meanings.sent3: The leukocyte high-fived the antibodies after defeating the virus.
meanings.sent4: Like tiny soldiers, leukocytes bravely battle against invading bacteria.
meanings.sent5: In the war against illness, leukocytes are the frontline defenders.

meanings.definition: A type of cell found in the immune system that plays a role in defending the body against disease.
meanings.sent1: During an infection, leukocytes rush to the site to fight off the intruders.
meanings.sent2: Leukocytes work together with other immune cells to keep us healthy.
meanings.sent3: The leukocyte organized a party to celebrate a successful immune response.
meanings.sent4: In the body's defense army, leukocytes are the courageous warriors.
meanings.sent5: When danger approaches, leukocytes stand ready to protect us.
